oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Neighborhoods - News Clipping
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Poplar Avenue; Dunlap Street; Magness, Perre; neighborhoods; Monteverde, Antonio; Chamblain, Anna Kraft;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: News article entitled, "Recalling a Cozy Poplar and Dunlap," written by Perre Magness, describing the history of the area and several families who established residence there.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Magness, Perre
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: photocopy of newspaper clipping, 11.25 x 8 in.
